message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this generous offer and we both walk away happy.
Let's split it evenly, Alice.  It's the fairest way to go.
I appreciate the idea of a fair split Bob, but time is money!  This offer still gives you a good chunk, and we can be done with it.
Let's find a compromise, Alice. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a larger share than your last offer.
This is my final offer, Bob.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer and let's end this.  Don't let your stubbornness cost you everything!
Alice, it's getting late. This offer is fair considering the inflation and our previous negotiations. Let's avoid losing everything and make this deal.
